document.full_text: the world has to act against hunger, which affects 13 percent of the population, if it wants to strengthen global security, a candidate to run the u.n. food and agriculture organization said on tuesday.
document.title: food security key to global peace: fao candidate
lines_and_colors: the world has to act against hunger, which affects 13 percent of the population, if it wants to strengthen global security, a candidate to run the u.n. food and agriculture organization said on tuesday.
